pageContext.public_note: These Thanksgiving Break camps are 1 day classes. Students must sign up for each workshop individually. This Tuesday workshop will focus on building a LEGO Belt/Pulley Cars.
pageContext.course_type_long_description: How can we make cars go? Find out when we learn about transmissions and belt drive. Build your car then decorate, race across the room, or take on Mount Doom, the steepest mountain in the land.
pageContext.action_url_comment: These camps are 1 day classes. Students must sign up for each workshop individually. This Monday workshop will focus on building a LEGO Space Base!
